rule.name: PreferBuilderPatternChaining
rule.message: Builder pattern methods should be chained instead of using intermediary variable assignments
rule.description: When using builder patterns, prefer method chaining over multiple intermediary variable assignments. Use final variables with chained method calls instead of reassigning the same variable multiple times.
